lines.text: Jun, why do you only take pictures of the rooms we stay in and never what we see outside while we travel?
Those other things are in my memory. The hotel rooms and the airports are the things I'll forget.
the clothes make the man. I mean look at that damn hat on your head, you look like a damn mosquito-legged chimpanzee, I mean-
[he abruptly breaks up]
Well, what about on Jupiter?
At the time of his death, if he were on Jupiter, Elvis would've weighed six-hundred and forty-eight pounds.
Six-hundred and forty-eight. Damn.
Hi! Good night!
Good night. How may I help you?
Umm... We would like most cheap room please do you have?
All our rooms for two people are the same rate.
Oh.
(speaking in Japanese) What'd he say?
(speaking in Japanese) I'm not exactly sure. (In English) I'm sorry, that is too expensive.
[Mitzukoand Jun hear a loud noise outside]
Was that a gun?
Probably. This is America.
Don't call me Elvis! If you can't use my proper name, why don't you try "Carl Perkins, Jr." or something? I mean, I don't call them "Sam & Dave", do I?
Hey, man. My name is Dave.
You know, Memphis does look like Yokohama. Just more space. If you took away sixty percent of the buildings in Yokohama, it would look like this.
What can I do you for?
I would like to buy this newspaper.
Well now, you should buy this one here as well. The Tri-State Defender.
No, thank you. I think I need only this one.
Well, you know, you only need one leg to get around on if that's all you got. But it sure helps having two, now, doesn't it?
Oh, well, uh, yes. This one too.
How about some magazines?
Hey! Listen... They're fucking.
Hey, everybody! Check your guns at the bar!

[both stare at a plum on the counter, neither saying a thing]
I don't think you should eat that thing.
Yeah, you're probably right.
You gonna eat it?
No, I'm not gonna eat that thing.
[at this, the night clerk casually reaches over and eats the plum in one bite]
Hey...you ate my plum!

[hearing a radio ad for seafood, disgusted at what he is hearing]
"Jiffy Squid"? Turn that damn thing off! "Jiffy Squid"
[grimaces in dislike and shakes his head]
